com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.logger

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.logger.Logger

  • public final class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    The custom logger implementation that is used throughout the library. The log file can be found in the base server folder called "mml.log", and contains very useful information about the execution of the library.
